description: My place is close to Roberta's, Momo Sushi Shack, Cafe Ghia, Morgan Stop (L Train). You’ll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. Beautiful, clean, residential Loft factory building.
name: Clean Bohemian Palace
review: Kate's place is perfect! We felt welcome and cozy here, and it had everything we needed - comfy bed, lots of natural light, cool rooftop, the essentials and on top of that it is beautifully decorated. We enjoyed and explored the neighborhood- the place is located near so many amazing dining options, coffee shops, cool stores and the L train. Kate was very caring and wonderful, we hope to be back soon!
